amendment.description: To accelerate the removal or security of fissile materials, radiological materials, and related equipment at vulnerable sites worldwide.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3192 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3192 proposed by Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S5771-5774; text: CR S5771-5772) To accelerate the removal or security of fissile materials, radiological materials, and related equipment at vulnerable sites worldwide.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3192 proposed by Senator Domenici.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3192 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
